page.title: 04LOCAL SHOPS
page.content: {POST OFFICE} Outside the post office is the post box.The post box is red. There is a slit near the top where the letters go in. The post office sells stamps. Stamps are pieces of sticky paper which you put on to letters then into the post box. Money comes in all shapes and sizes and different colours. A 1p is a bronze round coin.A 2p coin is bronze but slightly bigger than a 1p. The 5p is silver slightly smaller than the 2p. The 10p is silver slightly bigger than the 2p .The 50p is silver it is a 7 sided coin. The pound coin is gold and round. A pound note is a piece of water marked paper with a silver strip in the middle. There are also 5,10 and 20 pound notes. The post office also sells food and sweets.
